Other OCI: other comprehensive income loss net of tax period increase decrease
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value acquisitions
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
stock issued during period value restricted stock award net of forfeitures
stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock value acquired cost method
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital tax effect from share based compensation
__unmapped__: stock issued during period shares acquisitions
stock issued during period shares share based compensation
